body_content.explanation: the action of stopping a document, ticket, law, etc. from being legally or officially acceptable:
examples: Premature disclosure of the test sites might lead to invalidation of the experiment.
Voting fraud led to the invalidation of the election.

body_content.explanation: the action of proving that an opinion, argument, etc. is wrong:
examples: Their terrible behaviour has led to the invalidation of any argument they make.
This finding constitutes the invalidation of many traditional approaches.
